rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Mmm...munch...yum... Mo mo mo!
Morimori declare Love Raspberry
is tastiest fruit in Iira!

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0002
rows.name:
By the way, Morimori thank
friends for bringing many foods.

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0003
rows.name:
By the way, is something
happen? Friends looking very
small all of sudden somehow.

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Mo-mo? It Morimori who get big?
Ohoho, friends have great humor
sense! Morimori almost buy it!

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Morimori learning all about cuisine
of Iira. Working very hard to sample
many dishes. Learning by eating!

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Favorite is Love Raspberry. So
sweet! So big! So plump! So juicy!

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Mo? If eat too many, Morimori
get even more biggerer? Ohoho,
again with the jokings!

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0008
rows.name:
...Wait. Friends have serious
faces. Is possible friends actually
concerned, rather than teasing?

rows.label: tlk70000044_01_msg0009
rows.name:
Is very OK! No need for worries! Morimori
still growing so is needing lots of
nutrients. Is sign of good health!
